attributes.action: Remove The Sun Liverpool and Everton pages from Twitter.
attributes.additional_details: Please sign the E-Petition to Rid Twitter of The Sun Liverpool and Everton pages. No true Reds or Blues would follow these disgraceful pages. We all know of the lies this tabloid spread and they do not deserve to be mentioned in the same breath as our clubs. It's up to us now. #efc #lfc #jft96
